translation: Tohyih vuchuhv na tuhndụ̄ rbn kya kvr hsụ̄ valyn sintụ̄?
Kya tmụ̄ kr na tihnz tdbyr ẓaʿʿ?
Th timn pytth svuzin janavar fvj dr fvj.
Yim timn pytth payih nh āmczi myczi hnz kanhi travan ạsụ̄.

Pth kvrnkh yih ḥal zanth (charvayan hund) drvnbrumut bvs (yih chhe tamhi vaqʿch dhkr yus rsvl Allah ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hndi vladti mbarkh brvnhh pnczah (50) doh pysh avs āmut. Yamnh chih ḥbshy ḥkvmtuk ʿīsạe badshah abrhh āv shytthn (60) sasn hund lshkr hyth amhi ghrẓh mks ḥmlh krnhi zi khanh kʿbs lrvihe. Aath lshkrs mnz ạsụ̄ kynhh hsụ̄ thi. Yylhi suh mzdlfs th mnyā hs mnzbag vvt, achank āe janavar smndr aand fvjav fvjav pnnhi tvnthi mnz knhi phlụ̄ hyth th timav trvv lshkrs pytth yimn knhi phlyn hund rvud. Yas pytth thi yih knhi phvl pyvan avs tmụ̄ sund maz avs glụ̄ glụ̄ vsith pyvan. Yithh pạtthụ̄ gvv yih svrue lshkr tbah. ʿrbs mnz avs yih vaqʿh sytthah mshhvr th yih svrh nạzl gczhnh vqth ạsụ̄ mks mnz sash bdụ̄ nfr tim mvjvd yihnzn achhn brvntthh knhi yih vaqʿh pysh āmut avs. Tmam ahli ʿrb ạsụ̄ manan zi hsụ̄ valyn hnz yih tbạhy gyih ṣrf Allah tʿālyā sndi qdrt sintụ̄.)
